abstract: The economy may be showing signs of a turnaround, but at least one analyst thinks there is more pain ahead for Citigroup.
snippet: The economy may be showing signs of a turnaround, but at least one analyst thinks there is more pain ahead for Citigroup.
lead_paragraph: The economy may be showing signs of a turnaround, but at least one analyst thinks there is more pain ahead for Citigroup, the humbled banking giant that is one-third owned by the federal government.

headline.main: Analyst Sees More Pain for Citi
